name: PURE & SIMPLE - handmade shea soap - no added scent - 4 oz.
description:
This is simply GOOD shea soap for folks who are extra scent-sitive ;)  Made with the same formula as my other bars - (no sense messing around with a great recipe) only without added fragrance or essential oils. 

Wholesome oils of olive, coconut, palm, castor bean, soy, and a generous helping of shea butter deliver a great, bubbly lather that rinses clean without leaving a residue on your body.  The aroma of just these ingredients together translate into a beautiful, soft subtle scent of plain CLEAN. 

Many people ask if they moisturize, and I reply that they do not so much moisturize as that they clean and condition without stripping your skin of it's precious natural oils promoting healthier, more balanced skin.  Naturally free of harsh detergents, phosphates, sulfates and artificial anything.  Better for your skin AND the environment.     

There is no pic of the soap w/ a label, but it does come with one as in omes in third pic except reading "Pure & Simple" :)

It costs relatively a lot to send one bar of soap so buy in multiples and save!  Check out my listing for 4 bars PLUS a bonus lip balm and $5 shipping in Canada - $8 to U.S.


Thanks for visiting :)

name: All Natural Lip Balm - w/ sea buckthorn oil - 4.3g tube
description:
The majority of lip balms on the market are made with ultra processed petroleum based products (ie. paraffin, mineral oil) - not skin or earth friendly!  Sure they moisturize, but at the same time worsening the condition so you need to moisturize more often.           

Treat your kisser kindly with a soothing blend of unrefined Canadian beeswax, unrefined cocoa butter, organic virgin coconut oil, cold pressed grapeseed oil, sea buckthorn oil, castor bean oil, and vitamin E. These lip balms glide on smoothly, are juicy yet long lasting... a customer favorite!  This unisex formula leaves the lightest sheen on your lips - just enough to look dewy and kissable.  They've all been very lightly flavored with all natural botanical extracts.  

Along with the usual soothing and protective natural ingredients, these little tubes of lip savers have been infused with a generous amount of sea buckthorn oil.  Sea buckthorn oil is derived from the berries of the sea buckthorn shrub whose berries are an extremely high source of vitamin C, vitamin E,  essential amino acids and beta carotene.  This oil is widely included in high end skin products to speed skin regeneration and effectively combat wrinkles as well as being credited with promoting the healing of skin injuries such as burns, sunburns,  wounds and eczema.    

Inspired by wording on the iconic British WWII poster, the tube wisely advises to Keep Calm and Carry Balm. Freshly made without synthetic coloring, flavors or preservatives.  Meticulously made and shrink wrapped.

Choose:
-banana
-buttermint
-coconut
-lime mint
-spiced chai
-rosemary & pink grapefruit
-wild cherry

Buy 5 and get one FREE  :D

name: FOUR BARS of Handmade Shea Soap + BONUS lip balm - $5 shipping in Canada and discounted to the U.S.
description:
We've carefully formulated our soap bars from scratch with 100% biodegradable vegetable oils and emollients (no premade bases or animal products).  An age old method of soapmaking called cold processing is used to create a perfectly balanced natural product that cleans and conditions skin without stripping of it's natural oils AND without leaving a residue on your body or the environment.  These blissful bars of sweet soapiness really are a gift from the earth!

People lather and slather chemicals onto their bodies everyday while rinsing this mess into the water system.  Many mass produced "soaps" and body washes are actually synthetic petroleum based detergents and moisturizers and, therefore, not skin or earth friendly.    

Discover the difference using natural can make to your skin.  Folks who use an all natural, handmade soap know what I'm talking about.   Mild cleansing for the whole family free of added harsh detergents, phosphates and sulfates (SLS) for the love of your skin and the earth :)

This listing is for FOUR full size bars totaling at least one full pound of soap and one full size tube of lip balm.  Don't forget to leave a message with your choices.

currently available:
amazemint
baby me - unscented - ultra mild (80% olive oil)

Muskoka boathouse (cedarwood/sandalwood/spice blend)

Soaps consist of a carefully formulated blend of olive oil, soy oil, coconut oil, palm oil, shea butter, castor bean oil, essential oils, phthalate-free fragrance oils; some contain bamboo charcoal, French clay or botanical parts.  


About the lip balm:
Made with cold pressed grapeseed oil, unrefined Canadian beeswax, organic virgin coconut oil, unrefined cocoa butter, plant based candellila wax, sea buckthorn oil, and lightly flavored with natural extracts. Meticulously made and shrink wrapped.

name: 10 Bars of Handmade Soap + BONUS Lip Balm + FREE SHIPPING within Canada, discounted to the U.S.
description:
You will receive:

10 - luscious handmade shea soaps (your choice)
 1 - all natural lip balms (choose from 6 flavors)
 
It seems most people appreciate a natural, handmade soap, but its use is still somehow considered a novelty.  Consider that it is something we slather onto ourselves everyday and that our skin is our body's largest organ, doesn't it deserve the best?  The vast majority of "beauty bars" are made of compressed synthetic detergent, tallow, and mineral oil.  No wonder they only cost a buck a piece.   Why oh why treat your skin that way?  

People who use traditional handmade soap know what I'm talking about.  Keep all the soap to yourself or share nicely ;)    
        

About the soap:
I lovingly create my soaps from scratch the cold process way - never any pre-made bases or melt & pour.    Skin loving, wholesome ingredients the majority of which include olive oil, coconut oil, and shea butter are chosen for their individual properties that contribute to healthy skin cleansing and conditioning.  Every bar contains the perfect combination of oils and emollients to clean and condition skin without leaving a residue on your skin OR the environment.   They are lusciously fragranced with either essential oils or phthalate-free fragrance oils.  Mild and gentle and free of harsh detergents, phosphates and sulfates.  100% biodegradable goodness for the love of your skin and the earth.

currently available:

- amazemint (minty fresh)
- baby me (with oats & honey - ultramild  - no added scent)
- beach house (driftwood, ripe fig, salt air) (o/s 'til mid May)
- oatmeal, milk & honey (comfort scent of sweet cooked oats)
- coconut lime (perfect balance of sweet and sparkly)
- French pear 
- green tea & cucumber (w/pureed cucumber)
- kharma (patchouli/jasmine)
- lavender (infuse w/French lavender essential oil)
- Muskoka boathouse (spiced cedarwood/sandalwood blend) 
- cinnamon orange (sweet orange & warm cinnamon)
- peaceful patchouli (accented with the sweetness of orange)
- pomegranate (lush & fruity)
- sweet bee (luscious honey floral)
- vanilla (deep, dark & sultry)
- eucalyptus & tea tree  w/ bamboo charcoal

About the lip balm:
Made with unrefined Niagara beeswax, organic virgin coconut oil, unrefined cocoa butter, plant based candellila wax, grapeseed oil, sea buckthorn oil, and lightly flavored with natural extracts.  Meticulously made and shrink wrapped.

flavors:

wild cherry

name: SWEET BEE - Handmade Shea Soap - 4 oz. - cold processed
description:
How to describe this sweet treat of a soap - it's a soft, clean honey-floral with notes of peach, apple and toffee.  Smells amazing!!  Not only will it leave your skin heavenly scented, but you will experience a clean like no commercial soap can offer, without phosphates, sulfates or harsh detergents.  Rinses clean, too!  Thats the beauty of cold processed soaps.  Good for your skin AND the environment.

As with all my soaps, these were made in small batches from scratch with olive oil, coconut oil, sustainably farmed palm oil, soy oil, shea butter, cocoa butter, castor oil and, in this case, a premium cosmetic grade fragrance oil (2%).  It is all combined with purified water and sodium hydroxide (lye) which begins the saponifying process - no true soap without lye!  Not to worry, there is NO active lye left in the finished product.  Four to six weeks later, a wonderful, wondrous cleanser for your showering enjoyment.

Your soap will come wrapped in a 100% post consumer recycled paper wrapped with a raffia ribbon.

Canada Post charges almost as much to ship one bar as four, so buy buy in multiples and save!!  Check out my listing for 4 bars w/ discounted shipping. 



Thanks for looking!

These luscious bars have been infused with pure, sweet orange essential oil accented with warm spicy clove bud.  This invigorating scent combo is a classic and most reminiscent of the holidays, but I love it anytime :)

Our soaps are created from scratch with 100% biodegradable vegetable oils.  The cold process method of soapmaking results in a product that cleans and conditions skin gently without leaving a film on yourselves or the environment.  They are naturally free of added harsh detergents, phosphates and sulfates (SLS).

name: MUSKOKA BOATHOUSE - Handmade Shea Soap - 4 oz. - cold processed
description:
Sumptuous and soothing woodsy scents of cedar and sandalwood with a dash of spice.  Loved by both men and women alike, this bar is a best seller I can't make enough of.

As with all my other bars these were cold processed in small batches using premium skin loving oils and butters of olive, coconut, palm (sustainable), soy and shea.  Naturally 100% biodegradable and free of detergents, phosphates and sulphates for the love of your skin and the earth. 

Muskoka is a magical, wilderness area in Northern Ontario with countless sparkling lakes, pounding waterfalls, towering pines, and the majestic granite cliffs of the Canadian Shield.  It's a favorite escape for those of us lucky enough to live nearby.  Imagine a hammock, giant cedars, and nothing else :)
 
Ask about $5 flat rate shipping for min. $20 order within Canada & discounted to the U.S. 

Thank you!

name: Oakmoss Handmade Shea Soap - 4 oz. - cold processed
description:
Oakmoss is an earthy aroma reminiscent of bark, seashore and foliage.  This soap has a remarkable wet, forest floor appeal many will recognize from fragrances (esp. men's).  Made especially (but not exclusively!) with the guys in mind. 

Naturally handmade with 100% biodegradable oils of olive, coconut, palm, soy, shea butter, and castor bean oil.  It's luscious lathers are free of added harsh detergents, phosphates, and sulphates.  Be good to your skin and the earth.

NOTE: Since the essential oil of oakmoss is a known skin sensitizer, this bar contains a phthalate-free, body safe oakmoss fragrance.

Buy in multiples and save on shipping!  

Thanks for visiting!

name: LAVENDER - Handmade Shea Soap - 4 oz. - all natural cold processed
description:
Herbalists regard lavender as the essential oil most associated with the healing of skin.  Therapists use it for it's antiseptic and analgesic properties while it is preferred by aromatherapists for it's unparalleled soothing scent.  While there are several types of lavender from different regions, French lavender is preferred for it's balance of floral and herbal fragrance notes.  This 100% natural bar is infused with a decadent helping of pure French lavender essential oil.         
  
My soaps are made the cold process way with all vegetable oils and emollient butters including olive oil and shea butter.  This produces a superior product to commercially produced "beauty bars" many of which use detergent as a cleaning agent, additional chemicals for lathering and inferior mineral oil for conditioning.  No wonder they only cost a buck a bar!   

Cold processed soaps are free of detergents, phosphates, sulphates and are 100% biodegradable.  They clean your skin gently and effectively without leaving a film.  Do something good for your skin and the earth.  It's an affordable luxury you'll soon wonder how you ever lived without.          

Your bar will come wrapped with product info and raffia ribbon. 

Buy in multiples and save!  Canada post charges almost as much to ship one bar as four.  Check out my listing for four bars PLUS bonus and discounted shipping:


Thanks for visiting!

name: BABY ME - Handmade Shea Soap - Ultra Mild / No Added Scent - 3.5 oz. - cold processed
description:
I typically formulate my bars to offer the optimal in cleaning AND conditioning which involves a blending of carefully calculated ratios of different oils with different properties.  What makes these luscious bars ultra-mild is the additional olive oil in it - totaling over 75% with the rest made up of coconut and palm oils.  This ensures a gentle yet cleansing soap with a slightly more bubbly, lotion-like lather than a classic castile (pure olive oil) soap. Suitable for babies, faces and the super-sensitive.  Keep away from eyes, though.  All true soap no matter how mild for skin will still sting eyes!

As with all my soaps, these were lovingly handmade from scratch with premium fair trade ingredients.  

Ultra-mild formula does not contain any added scent - just the natural wholesome scent of pure soap with oats & honey.

Buy 4 bars (any combo) and receive $5 flat rate shipping PLUS receive a free lip balm!

name: EUCALYPTUS & TEA TREE - Handmade Shea Soap - 4 0z. - all natural cold process
description:
This amazing bar of cold process soap contains Australian tea tree oil and invigorating eucalyptus. Tea tree has a fresh, astringent, slightly medicinal scent and is used as a powerful immune stimulant as well as to combat oily skin and acne.  We've pulled out all the stops and also fortified this amazing bar with the remarkable powers of activated bamboo charcoal for that extra dimension of clean! 

About activated bamboo charcoal:

* anti-bacterial and anti-fungal

* internally used in powder form as detox agent to treat poisonings, drug overdoses, bowel diseases, indigestion and heartburn to name few.

* used externally in poultices and compresses for relief of skin irritations and pain.

* Added to soap it acts as a skin purifier by attracting toxins like a magnet - relief for insect bites and rashes, as well as controlling acne and eczema.  Use in the kitchen for ridding hands of food smells and in the shower for an extra dimension of clean!

These 100% all natural bars are lovingly made from scratch with olive oil, sustainably farmed palm oil, coconut oil, shea butter, castor bean oil, food grade activated bamboo charcoal, and essential oils of tea tree and eucalyptus.  The lather is ultra-rich and creamy and naturally free of added detergents, phosphates, sulfates and synthetic color.

This listing is for one bar.  

Buy any four bars (in any combo) + get a BONUS lip balm and pay only $5 shipping in Canada - $8 to the U.S.  See listing for four bars.

These botanical bars of goodness are lovingly handmade from scratch by me using a traditional method of soapmaking.  This produces a superior product to commercial bars many of which are many times made up of compressed detergents, sulfates (for lather) and mineral oil.  Each oil I use serves a purpose and the ratios are carefully calculated for optimum lathering, cleaning and conditioning.  They do their job mildly and GENTLY while also providing an all important aromatherapy experience! 

I use fair trade oils and emollients including olive, palm (from a sustainable source), coconut and copious amounts of shea butter.  Using a soap that's 100% biodegradable is a good move for your skin and the environment!

name: Beer Soap made with IPA - cold process - 4 oz.
description:
This honest to goodness soap is made with India Pale Ale beer (Muskoka's own Mad Tom IPA) along with skin nourishing oils of olive, coconut, palm, soy, castor and heaps of shea butter.
 
Why beer?  It is made with hops - an herb with many skin nurturing properties.   What sets India pale ale apart for much of its consumers (in both its liquid and bar form ;) is that it's made with the highest % of hops.   It's natural earthy, hop-py scent is accentuated with a touch of ginger lime - an invigorating unisex scent.  A perfect intro to natural soaps for the guys out there who think handmade soaps are too frou-frou for them!  Cleans and conditions skin without leaving a residue on our bodies OR the environment.   Naturally free of harsh detergents, phosphates, sulfates and artifical color.  

These luscious bars come wrapped in a different label than our usual because they're special ;)

Note:  the last pic was taken on a different camera on a different day, but the soap is the same!

It's relatively expensive to ship one bar of soap!  Get a price break and buy in multiples.  Check out the BUNDLES:  In Canada four bars ship for $5 while 10 bars ship FREE - discounted to the U.S.
